Well this time I decided to investigate the Manosphere. The cult mentality of Red Pill think, how they monetise it, the narrative they are selling to their followers, and how this can result in some young men being funnelled into the alt-right pipeline.

I looked into influencers like Fresh and Fit, Kevin Samuels, Rich Cooper, Anthony Dream Johnson of the 21 Convention, Donovan Sharpe, Roosh V, Owen Cook and Julien Blanc to weave together how they are selling the ‘alpha male’ dream to their followers - some of whom will end up classing themselves as incels, after realising that the ‘foolproof’ pickup artist game techniques don’t work for them.

And they’re all having their misogynistic ideas backed up by the one and only Jordan B Peterson, of course.

Sources:
https://docs.google.com/document/d/1n2VawDpszhhOsGxhhve5F8u4yig2g4cdyBd-8v9ui5k/edit?usp=sharing
